Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student might draw two people, which could represent the students communicating.
The student might include some kind of line between two objects, potentially indicating the string, but its purpose may not be clear.
CANNOT: The student is likely unable to correctly depict the string as a means for sound to travel between the cups (student doesn't understand the role of the string).
The student does not show either person holding a cup in a way that demonstrates the function (student misunderstands the purpose of cups in the device).
The student cannot accurately label or illustrate the function of the device in solving communication (labels, if any, might be incorrect or unrelated).
The student does not understand or cannot show how the device facilitates communication over a distance (device purpose is misunderstood or not illustrated).
